text: Nieuwebrug () is a village in Heerenveen in the province of Friesland, the Netherlands. It had a population of around 215 in 2017.Kerncijfers wijken en buurten 2017 - CBS Statline ==History== Before 2014, Nieuwebrug was part of the Skarsterlân municipality and before 1984 it was earlier part of Heerenveen. ==References== ==External links== Category:Populated places in Friesland
title: Nieuwebrug, Friesland
